description: A CPHD file is similar to a .PHP file. However, the CloudChan code is encapsulated within <$ … $> tags instead of the instead of <? … ?> tags used by PHP. When a server running CloudChan processes a CPHD web page, it returns an HTML document with a 200 status code.
NOTE: The CPHD format is not limited to the web as it is designed to work for any XML document.
